title: An Important Update From Michelle, Plus: Nayte & Rodney on Their Bromance
description:
Michelle flies solo for the first time this week on “Happy Hour” and shares an important life update. Then she is joined by her fiancé Nayte and their third wheel Rodney for a fun conversation about friendships in the Bachelor franchise, how Michelle and Nayte handle the pressure that surrounds them, and why Rodney needs sign-off from Michelle on anyone he plans to wife up in the future.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
